name: Guns, Germs, and Steel
alt: Cover of Guns, Germs, and Steel
description: Jared Diamond argues that Europe’s dominance stems from geography and environment—abundant domesticable plants, animals, and the east-west axis—not inherent superiority. Civilization’s rise hinged on agriculture, germs, technology, and their cascading effects.

name: The Great Gatsby
description: F. Scott Fitzgerald captures the glittering yet tragic decadence of the Roaring Twenties, as mysterious millionaire Jay Gatsby pursues the American Dream and lost love in a world built on illusion.
